i have downloaded this game from both of your uploads
1. i mount it with dtool
2. i use the steambackup2.exe to extract files to my steam game file which is "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common"
3. copy and replace all files from crack folder from the disk image to the root folder of dead island.
4. copy and replace all files i downloaded from this torrent to the root folder of dead island.
5. add dead island to steam game list
6. start the game with "deadislandgame.exe" while steam is running.

7. >>>>>>I cant save my progression
7. >>>>>>I cant save my progression

I cant save my progression
every time i restart the game, all my info, achievement, records, check points are wiped.

am i doing any thing wrong?
i guess i m the unlucky one after all?

oooooooooooooooookkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk

i just manage a sort of solusion for my particular problem.

i realised my progression data (the "out" folder) is generated in the 
"Steam\steamapps\common\Dead Island\DI"
folder, which is not looking right.
I manually copy and replace all of them to 
"Steam\steamapps\common\Dead Island\out"
which works, so far no problem.

i dont know why is this happening, it looks like some kind of script error to me, and it seems i m the only few who are bringing this up huh?

anyway thanks for the upload

btw
by "my progression data (the "out" folder) is generated in the wrong folder" i mean i did all the cracking copy and replace thing right, and i do hav an empty "out" folder at the root dead island folder.
before i enter the game for the first time, there is no "out" folder in deadisland/di folder.
the problem is the system automatically genrerate the "out" folder to deadisland/di

hope this help someone else out there.
